类型: Size: Suit for waist size 32"-36"Color: Gold Black
评论详情: I do wish I went up a size to have more end on the belt while wearing (was hoping to wear it looped around at the end) but it’s so cute. Totally upgrades a basic outfit. It’s the perfect mix of mainstream and alternative. Unfortunately I’m a gold girly so the silver belts at the thrift just dont scratch my itch for a good studded belt. I’d also consider this work appropriate if your stuck on a business attire

类型: Size: Suit for waist size 42"-46"Color: Black-gold Rivet
评论详情: Very cool black belt. Great for goth/ punk style outfits. It's a black plastic pleather type belt with big round gold stud along it. It's not super thick but not really thin, kind of a medium thickness. It looks pretty sick with black jeans, or you could wear it over a dress as well. I like that it comes in larger sizes although I did get way too big of a size, that's on me. I took one star off because the fake leather material isn't amazing and I am noticing some small cracks already so I know it won't last as long as a real leather belt would.

评论概述: Decent quality, size chart is misleading

评论详情: Product quality was nice and it’s a cute belt. But the size chart is misleading. Size up!

类型: Size: Suit for waist size 42"-46"Color: Black-gold Rivet
评论详情: This is a solid, well made looking belt. I’ve only worn it twice since it came in but I have to say that it looks great and is a good belt, thus far. The leatherwork looks great, solid stitching, and the metal work is gorgeous. The studs are bright and shiny and really pop against that black leather. Fits great with plenty of room to add in a couple of holes, if needed. It’s a good deal for the price!

类型: Size: Suit for waist size 27"-31"Color: Black-gold Rivet
评论详情: I rocked this style belt back in the early 2000s (with the requisite low waisted tight jeans) and am delighted they've made a comeback - this time with gold tipped finishing and studs for a chic flair.  The construction is well made - looks much more spendy than it is.  The sizing was accurate for me and I like that there isn't a long overhang of belt leftover once pulled through.  Try it!

类型: Size: Suit for waist size 32"-36"Color: Black-gold Rivet
评论详情: Beautiful belt, no complaints and it looks great with a casual look and something more dressed up,really pulls the outfit together. I think it's a dupe for a much more expensive belt, looks great!

类型: Size: Suit for waist size 27"-31"Color: Silver Black
评论详情: This belt is very fashionable and looks like a belt from a boutique but for half the price! The studs add a little pop to the belt. Very cute to wear with jeans or to add something to your outfit.
Absolutely gorgeous belt. Beautiful construction, well made, looks great on. True to size measurements. Would definitely recommend, super cute and versatile with a range of outfits!

类型: Size: Suit for waist size 32"-36"Color: Black-gold Rivet
评论详情: Super on trend, this belt gives just the right punch of style to a basic jeans and sweater or vest fit.  Sizing is correct and I don't mind the faux leather since there are so many metal "buttons" that bring the shine.  Lots of details and excellent quality for the price.

类型: Size: Suit for waist size 27"-31"Color: Black-gold Rivet

评论详情: Nice quality belt. You can’t tell it is faux leather. The rivets give it a fun funky feel. Gold is a nice gold color.

类型: Size: Suit for waist size 32"-36"Color: Black-gold Rivet
评论详情: I like everything about this belt. The length is perfect, it comes with a little tool to make more holes if needed, and it looks really nice. It’s not too wide and looks good with jeans or nicer pants.

评论概述: Great dupe for much more expensive versions.
类型: Size: Suit for waist size 32"-36"Color: Black-gold Rivet
评论详情: This is an excellent-quality dupe for the $580 KHAITE or $78 Madewell versions. I'm between a size 6-8 (28/29 in jeans) and ordered the Black/Gold color in size 32"-36". It's a soft, flexible material, and the gold-toned hardware is a very realistic gold that's not too yellow or orange. It is PU leather, which won't last forever. But it's well made and a quality product for the price. It's a great alternative to spending much more money on a trendy item that will eventually phase out of style.

评论详情: The JASGOOD Women Punk Leather Belt is the perfect accessory to add some edge to any outfit. The studs give it a bold, fashionable look, and the leather is sturdy yet comfortable. It fits well and holds up over time. A must-have for anyone who loves punk-inspired fashion!

类型: Size: Suit for waist size 27"-31"Color: Black-gold Rivet
评论详情: I love this belt!!! What a fantastic way so spicing up a maxi dress or skirt!! It sits well and doesn’t come undone easily. The studs are made well and sit nicely in the belt material.

I have been loving, embellished and unique belts lately, you can literally throw on some flare jeans and a baggy sweater and if you have a fun belt on, it’s immediately going to elevate your outfit. This one is absolutely stunning. I love the golden embellishments.

评论概述: Cute, versatile and high quality belt
评论详情: I love this belt! For one thing, the sizing is 100% accurate, it fits perfectly without a ton of extra flap. It's thick enough to be durable, but thin enough to flex and not be bulky on skinny jeans. I love the studs and hardware, they are shinier than I thought they would be, I was expecting a cheap dull brushed plasticky metal, but these are very nice - real metal with a subtle but glamorous shine. This belt could be styled casual, dressy, punk, steam punk or western...you can get a lot of looks from this one piece. Love it!

类型: Size: Suit for waist size 27"-31"Color: Black-gold Rivet
评论详情: Nice belt, not leather but with the studs you cannot tell. TTS. Love the gold studs, bought the brown as well.

类型: Size: Suit for waist size 32"-36"Color: Black-gold Rivet
评论详情: Really nice belt  It comes with a manual belt hole puncher if you need to make it smaller. Don’t ask me how to use it but it’s there lol.  Really nice looking belt and my wife loves it

类型: Size: Suit for waist size 27"-31"Color: Black-gold Rivet
评论详情: This belt looks good. It feels a bit cheap, I’m not sure how it’s going to hold up to regular use. The sizing chart was accurate for me. I like the studded design.

类型: Size: Suit for waist size 32"-36"Color: Black-gold Rivet
评论详情: I hesitated to buy this based on the price, but it's a very nice belt that looks far more expensive than you would expect. I like that the width is between a skinny and traditional belt; it is perfect for my frame and style.  Highly recommend.
